body:
First time it prints all pods, it's not formatting either:

``` console
$  kubernetes git:(ha-controller-manager) ✗ k --namespace=kube-system get po
etcd-server-events-k-1-master   1/1       Running   0         23m

NAME                                    READY     STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
etcd-server-events-k-1-master           1/1       Running   0          23m

fluentd-cloud-logging-k-1-master        1/1       Running   0          23m
```

@kubernetes/kubectl

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: kubectl is printing pods twice
